verses.verse: <S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5414>'Designate<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge,<s%> of <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to you <S%H3027>through<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%>

that the <S%H7523>manslayer<s%> who <S%H5221>kills<s%> any <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H7684>unintentionally,<s%> <S%H1097>without<s%> <S%H1847>premeditation,<s%> may <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> and they shall <S%H1961>become<s%> your <S%H4733>refuge<s%> from the <S%H1350>avenger<s%> of <S%H1818>blood.<s%>

'And he shall <S%H5127>flee<s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> at the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> and <S%H1696>state<s%> his <S%H1697>case<s%> in the <S%H241>hearing<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of that <S%H5892>city;<s%> and they shall <S%H622>take<s%> him into the <S%H5892>city<s%> to them and <S%H5414>give<s%> him a <S%H4725>place,<s%> so that he may <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H5973>among<s%> them.

'Now <S%H3588>if<s%> the <S%H1350>avenger<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H7291>pursues<s%> him, then they shall not <S%H5462>deliver<s%> the <S%H7523>manslayer<s%> into his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he <S%H5221>struck<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> <S%H1097>without<s%> <S%H1847>premeditation<s%> and did not <S%H8130>hate<s%> him <S%H4480>beforehand<s%><S%H8543>.<s%> <S%H8032><s%>

'And he shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in that <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he <S%H5975>stands<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> for <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the one <S%H834>who<s%> is <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> in <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%> <S%H227>Then<s%> the <S%H7523>manslayer<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H935><s%> to his own <S%H5892>city<s%> and to his own <S%H1004>house,<s%> to the <S%H5892>city<s%> from <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H5127>fled.<s%>' "

So they <S%H6942>set<s%> <S%H6942>apart<s%> <S%H6943>Kedesh<s%> in <S%H1551>Galilee<s%> in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> and <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and Kiriath-arba (that is, <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>) in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

And <S%H4480>beyond<s%> <S%H5676><s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H4217>east<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho,<s%> they <S%H5414>designated<s%> <S%H1221>Bezer<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> on the <S%H4334>plain<s%> from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> and <S%H7216>Ramoth<s%> in <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> and <S%H1474>Golan<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> were the <S%H4152>appointed<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and for the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> who <S%H1481>sojourns<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them, that <S%H3605>whoever<s%> <S%H5221>kills<s%> any <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H7684>unintentionally<s%> may <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> and not <S%H4191>die<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H1350>avenger<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he <S%H5975>stands<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation.<s%>
